snippet: A new effort to provide full scholarships for medical school at the University of California, Los Angeles, should inspire questions about the fact that medical education in the United States is paid for largely by student debt.
abstract: A new effort to provide full scholarships for medical school at the University of California, Los Angeles, should inspire questions about the fact that medical education in the United States is paid for largely by student debt.

headline.main: Tackling the Problem of Medical Student Debt
